sentences.en: Can you foresee what will happen in the future?
sentences.cn: 你能预见将来会发生什么 吗 ?

sentences.en: How did you really foresee he'd make a pact with Stalin?
sentences.cn: 你到底是怎么预见他会和斯大林签定条约的?

sentences.en: I can foresee nothing but complications if we keep quiet.
sentences.cn: 如果我们保持沉默,我估计只会使事情复杂化.

sentences.en: I foresee that there will be problems.
I foresee we shall be very good friends.
sentences.cn: 我想,咱们一定可以成为好朋友的.

sentences.en: I’ve put your name on the list and I don’t foresee any problems.
sentences.cn: 我把你的名字写在名单上了，估计不会有什么问题。

sentences.en: It is hard to foresee what will happen.
sentences.cn: 很难预知将会发生之事.

sentences.en: It takes little imagination to foresee the possibility of considerable conflict between environmentalists and resource developers.
sentences.cn: 不难预见,环保主义者和资源开发者之间将会发生相当多的冲突.

sentences.en: Little did he foresee what a difference this would make.
sentences.cn: 他做梦也未曾想到这件事会有这么大的影响.

sentences.en: Many observers foresee a great change for foreign investments.
sentences.cn: 许多观察家预计外国投资将发生巨大的变化.

sentences.en: No one can foresee what will happen in the future.
sentences.cn: 谁也无法预见到将来会发生什么事.

sentences.en: Nobody could foresee his running away.
The disaster could not have been foreseen.
sentences.cn: 这场灾难是始料未及的。

sentences.en: They can not have foresee how thing will turn out.
sentences.cn: 他们不可能预知事情的结果.

sentences.en: Thou mayest foresee also the things which will be.
sentences.cn: 你也可以预见将要发生的事情.

sentences.en: We can't foresee the time when food raised in space will directly benefit humans below.
sentences.cn: 我们尚不能预言空间生产的食物什么时候能直接为人类受益.

sentences.en: We do not foresee any problems.
sentences.cn: 我们预料不会出任何问题。

trans.tran_en: to think or know that something is going to happen in the future
to think or know that something is going to happen in the future
